amendment.description: To modify the requirements for a water and waste disposal grant to the Alaska Department of Community and Economic Development.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2129 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2129 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Murkowski. (consideration: CR S14142-14143; text: CR S14143) To modify the requirements for a water and waste disposal grant to the Alaska Department of Community and Economic Development.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2129 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2129 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Murkowski.
